edit() - Method in class src.Editor
Main edit routine which loops until the end of the editing session.
Editor - Class in src
This class is the main processing class of the Fotoshop application.
Editor(ResourceBundle) - Constructor for class src.Editor
Create the editor and initialise its parser, shared Resource and internationalised resource.
execute() - Method in class commands.Command
Abstract method which executes the corresponding command Class executor based on the first word given by the user input.
execute() - Method in class commands.FlipHorizontalCommand
Flips the current image horizontally.
execute() - Method in class commands.FlipVerticalCommand
Flips the current image vertically.
execute() - Method in class commands.GetImageCommand
Retrieves an image saved from the image cache.
execute() - Method in class commands.HelpCommand
Returns some help information including the list of available commands.
execute() - Method in class commands.LookCommand
Returns the list of filters currently applied to the image.
execute() - Method in class commands.MonoCommand
Applies the monochromatic filter to the image.
execute() - Method in class commands.OpenCommand
Loads an image file from the root directory.
execute() - Method in class commands.PutImageCommand
Saves a copy of the current image to the image cache.
execute() - Method in class commands.QuitCommand
Quits the application upon request.
execute() - Method in class commands.Rotate90Command
Rotates the current image to 90 degrees clockwise.
execute() - Method in class commands.SaveCommand
Saves the current image to the project's root directory with a given file name.
execute() - Method in class commands.ScriptCommand
Runs a sequence of commands from a text file.
execute() - Method in class commands.UndoCommand
